text: I'm far from having played all the games in this series, but I always find them to be in the solid 8/10 territory. Nothing mind blowing, but great when you want that jRPG fix. Eternia, Symphonia and Vesperia are my 3 favorites so far, but I really want to give Berseria a shot. I think Tales of Legendia is the only game I actually didn't like at all. One thing's for sure... it's easy to get lost with all these titles.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky Tried Tales of Graces yet? My favorite so far, but finishing all games in this series is gonna take awhile still.

text: Well, I know everyone pretty much hated Tales of Legendia, but I still really love the characters and the soundtrack for that game. That and Senel being able to suplex and body slam monsters with his arts.

text: Legendia's soundtrack was definitely top notch.
author: SupraDarky

text:
Tales of Symphonia is my favorite game over all the other games.
I really love this game, the character's, the plot, and the soundtrack... It's perfect to me. 
Now i have finished the game for the 8 time.
And it's time to prove the other Tales of games, I've heard good things from them.

I agree that Legendia was kind of meh. Tales of the Abyss and Tales of Symphonia are must plays though if you are into JRPGs.
